name: KAERUROBOTTO
description:
Jump and push your opponents out of the KAERUROBOTTO platform arena by modifying the level using only the power of your robot frog legs ! KAERUROBOTTO is a local multiplayer game up to 4 players where you interact with the environment and the other players only by jumping. (Robot frogs from the future, multiple arenas and a glorious 4:3 screen ratio can be found in the game too !)

The game was made during the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam in 48 hours. 

Credits: 

- Programming: Baptiste DUBESSAY / Marie HAUUY 

- Game Design: Etienne ORMEZZANO

- Game Art: Swann KLEIN

- Music and Sound Design: Aurélien MONTERO

Additional infos: Playable with a XBOX controller / QWERTY Keyboard 

Player 1 control the menus between rounds: press Start/Enter to play another round, press Back/Backspace to return to main menu

A button / Space Bar: Jump (Stomp when holding)

Left Stick / WASD: Direction of jump

Alt + F4: Quit the game
